column3: â€œWent in to pick up Jack Herer and came out with Jack Flash.  It gives a productive high.  Nice in the morning with your coffee.  Energy, focus, lots of smiling and laughing...I've heard there's two versions.  This is the sativa dominant strain and it's wonderful.  I'm actually glad they were out of Jack Herer.   Jack Flash has made my top 10.  I'll be taking him to the beach next week.  He'll make fun....funner.â€

â€œNausea started kicking in hard, with the migraine not too far away. I was fully prepared to go take a nap, but decided to medicate first with some Jack Flash. I got out my rig and did a couple dabs. As I walked back into the kitchen, I saw all the dirty dishes I had planned to put off until later when I was feeling better, and suddenly I found myself washing them. The effects were almost immediate. Nausea was 1000 ti...â€

â€œ(Grower Grade- B) Not Flushed Properly 

This could be a 5 star strain if the grower does it right. Beautiful buds, definitely has some skunk in it due to its extreme stickiness. The high is A-1, very calming and uplifting at the same time. The problem I have is the the burn quality and taste are awful, caused by poor flushing. If clean and organic this flower has amazing potential. Grab some JackFlash and give it a ...â€
â€œLooks, Smells, Tastes... Jack Flash has it all and comes with a nice relaxing feeling but helps you get up and help you be productive in your day.â€

â€œBeing a huge fan of skunky strains, this one really hits the spot for me. The combination of sweet aromas with the skunk makes it a typical Haze, which is ideal for my personal needs. I felt very giggly and the only side effect was hardcore cottonmouth.â€

â€œNot too bad . You can taste the Jack genetics and the smell is spicy with a hint of pine-sol. The first hit you can feel it , the soaring feeling, like the accent of a roller coaster. The buzz is mellow , not to energetic but an uplifted engaging type feeling overcomes you . You just got to get up and do something and once you're about to do it you forget what you were about to do, haha. The length of the trip is abo...â€

â€œGreat indica dominant hybrid grown by Doc & Yeti. The nug was dense and when shook in the container it sounds like a rock! Nice crystals with orange hairs, citrusy spicy aroma, fruity earthy taste. Immediate effects were mellow and calming and kept intensifying for several minutes til it peaked for a great body buzz that lasted roughly 2 and a half hours. Great for my nausea and intestinal cramping, awesome sleep aid...â€

â€œIt's rare you see so many reviews so consistently describe a strain. In the case of Jack Flash, they could not be more accurate. The first 15 or so minutes with this strain is intense  - highly energetic, psychedelic even - and always does a good job of locking me in place, completely fascinated with whatever I'm doing or watching that moment. Afterward, the strain settles down into having more of an indica feel. It'...â€

â€œThis review is on Jack Flash wax, by Tumbleweed Edwards, CO.

First off this stuff is gorgeous.  It's like the consistency of a soft serve ice cream or cookie dough.  Second this smells of a subtle citrus aroma that carries over into the flavor, I also got a menthol flavor on the exhale I didn't smell.  As for the effects this is a very nice hybrid if your looking to relieve multiple symptoms.  It's definitely an up ...â€

â€œEnjoyed this at wake 'n bake with a mug of one love coffee...smooth up peaced out euphoria from hefty nugs started this day out right! Great pain and stress relief...good for general lazziness! This picky decades long tokerJill is impressed with yet another Jack!â€
â€œJack Flash was a really nice hybrid. It hit quick and smoothly. It didn't take long for me to feel talkative, for my anxiety to go away, but at the same time I was able to remain balanced.â€

â€œWow. Top 10 contender for sure. Bright, fresh lime green buds like its jack herer mother but with the fuck me high of its super skunk x haze father. Absolutely amazing pungent fruity tropical smell and flavour. The high hits you instantly with a nice even cerebral buzz, very euphoric and uplifting as with any well grown skunk variety. This cross is from Sensi Seeds and I've gotta give them props they've really outdon...â€
â€œSmoke enough of it and you'll be taken to a beautiful world.â€

â€œDefinitely one of my all-time favorite strains.  Easy smoke, tastes good, and provides one of the most productive highs for me. It's a steady high that mellows out to a gentle come down. Don't expect to get the mother of all buzzes, but do try this one when you are stressed, have a block"
column4: or just want to get creative.  An added bonus for me is that it also takes the edge off my arthritis pain.â€"

column3:
â€œFast acting morning medicine. An every day smoke for my wife and I, to counteract our depression and nausea. Great onset for those of us suffering from Cyclic Vomiting Syndrome. The nugs are tights, but large with a wonderful piney-skunk scent. I recommend hemp wick to smoke this strain as to obtain the most cannabinoids and flavors.
- Pale Wooden Doorâ€

â€œVery sweet and strong strain. The bud is dense, but not enough to make it too easily crumbled. The high takes very little time to kick in, smoked it an entire afternoon, the high can get really intense as you smoke more. I recommend if you don't want to get really backed you smoke this strain, because at first it is euphoric and fairly uplifting. As you get higher, the high gets fairly different, I got pretty tired, ...â€
â€œOutstanding HTC shatter in a PAX 3 soothes like a good massage except for the head.  A twist of lime and you are off.  kicks bsâ€

â€œFast acting morning medicine. An every day smoke for my wife and I, to counteract our depression and nausea. Great onset for those of us suffering from Cyclic Vomiting Syndrome. I recommend if you don't want to get really backed you smoke this strain, because at first it is euphoric and fairly uplifting. As you get higher, the high gets fairly different, I got pretty tired, ...â€

â€œI am normally an indica guy, mainly I think because I tend to get a bit paranoid or anxious on the sativas. Jack flash is the exception. Not only did it not produce the typical paranoia but it actually seemed to be anxiolytic. 

Very fragrant with pleasant citrus notes. Taste is similar to the scent.

Light, happy sativa with a clear head and no paranoia.â€

â€œComes on quickly but not all at once.  Very strong effect.  Very relaxing. All muscle tension gone. Mind couldn't stop racing but body was relaxed.  Very giggly and happy. Smooth inhale.  No coughing. Overall good stress reliever and mood lifter.  Mild pain relief.  Effects 4 -  6 hrs.  Strong effects first 4.â€

â€œExtremely potent strain, I smoke heavily everyday, it takes some great weed to get me soaring... This beautiful hybrid had me on the edge of my seat the entire time. 

Very nice look, dense nugs with what looks like a dusting of snow with heavy trichomes. Quite the  sticky flower courtesy of its lineage.

Good smell, extremely unique as other have noted. Definitely a hint of citrus with a odd chemmy smell. Hard to ex...â€

â€œSolid body high with enough head tingle but not total brain fuzziness. Hit the pax and felt the effects right away. Manageable munchies and good energy throughout the night. At least 3 hours before I could sense it wearing off. I would recommend this for daytime pain management or relaxing at home. Solid strain all around. I'm prone to paranoia and did not feel too anxious at all.â€

â€œGreat tasting cross with the classic Jack Herer.  Sativa dominant, very uplifting with lots of energy and focus.  Strong, clean flavors of oranges and pine with some skunkiness in there.  Potency was great, grown well.  Nice crystallization on the buds with slightly below average density.  At $30 an 1/8th after tax you can't really go wrong.â€

Light, happy sativa with a clear head and no paranoia.â€

â€œSMELLS AMAZING!! Smoked a one hitter and was smacked. Felt relaxed like a mf and hungry af lolâ€

â€œVery beautiful strain. Had dark orange hairs throughout. I felt very energized and giggly while being super relaxed. A great strain. Has a musky, citrus scent and a sweet flavor. I'd say it's a great strain overall. I am clearheaded enough to work completely stress free. Love it.â€

â€œJust picked up some Jack Flash, and it's one of the most productive and energetic hybrids I've had, personally even more than green crack.  It's uplifting too, just a very focused feel good high.  The body buzz is amazing too and reduces pain decently, it doesn't weigh you down or overwhelm, 

But for anyone looking for a productive energetic and uplifting high, pick up some ğŸ˜©ğŸ‘Œâ€

column3: â€œgreat strain that is light green with a decent amount of orange hairs which smells incredible, a mix of pine and lemons. The high is more sativa but still has a good body buzz, very little burn out. Overall very satisfied with this bud, try it out!â€

â€œReally like this strain.  A pungent odor and taste, spicy and earthy and a little sour.  Hits smoothly which brings on a wonderful meld of head clarity and body buzz.  The high comes on immediately and continues for up to two hours.  Comedown is nice and easy...no headaches, although you can keep the high going by some well placed hits as time goes on.  Lovely...would buy again for sure.â€

â€œThe Jack Flash  I smoked was purchased 
from Savage THC. It is a Jack Herer and Super Silver Haze creation
Great strain good motivating yet calming high
Super high THCA 25.7%/1.2% THC along with .2%CBD  and .1% CBDA is 
a good marriage
The terpene aroma is Earthy with a Tang..
Buds are compact with burnt orange hairs
Did not give me dry eyes or cotton mouth or the munchies
I found it Helpful with Pain
This is on the ...â€

â€œVery potent smell, tasty, Beautiful crystals, thc activates very quickly. 50/50 hybrid. Sativa came first for me followed by indica. One of the best hybrids I've ever tried. Definitely one of my new favorite strains. You won't be disappointed!â€

â€œSolid smoke. Has a slightly diesel taste to it, and has some cough to it so be careful with deep hits. It's reviews of happy & euphoric are on the money; great stress reliever and certainly sativa leaning in it's energy levels. Not an extremely heavy-hitting high, in my opinion. It has a head rush effect and the dry eyes are the worst of the drawbacks.â€
â€œLavish uplifting high! ğŸŒ¬â€
â€œUplifting. This may not be Sour Diesel, but it is a great Sativa high. I would recommend this to anyone who is looking for a bud they can smoke during the day.â€
â€œbomb had a gram before and loved it just got an eighth from az green house bomb shit too no complaintsâ€
â€œSmokes nice. Is uplifting and fast acting,with a fast feelâ€

â€œGreat Jack Herer/Skunk flavor! Super strong, few hits and I'm good! Not that I wouldn't smoke more lol especially with the slightly short duration when smoked in small amounts. Quick hitter though. Very impressed.â€
â€œwonderful strain, very tippy effect I felt from this. felt a very deep sense of content and fluidity.â€

â€œHonestly didn't think it was going help the way it did. As I'm more of an indica guy but will try hybrids or sativas for day use. This was mid day when I had it. I was uplifted yet relaxed. Helped my back pain and stressing out in general. Great smoke will get more. Only grabbed under 2 grams. Now I know it's good.â€

â€œEnergetic but somewhat shorter lasting effects. Can be quite smooth when smoked. Some appetite simulation depending on medical condition type. Works 6/10 for my pain(stronger indica's work better)and not really suggested as best option for digestive/muscle conditions and pains, nor is it ideal for sleep due to its energy. Has a very pleasant, somewhat sweet, but not overpowering aroma. There are mid size trichromes  ...â€

â€œEarthy smelling, Clean tasting, Quality Hybrid. 3.5 Stars 
Would recommend to anyone anytime. But it did burn quickly despite it's fairly dense buds.â€
â€œA greatâ€‹ little boost in the morning!â€

â€œJack Flash is one of the best strains I've had but one thing I didn't like about it is its chemical taste. Even if it tastes odd it still delivers one of the best and fastest hits that can last for hours. It has a very smooth transition with the sativa and indica effects.â€

â€œI bought an 8th from Rocky Road Despensary (1712 S. Chambers Road, Aurora, CO) for about $25 with an add from the CanniPages. The staff actually was very helpful which I ended up buying some edibals which were amazing as well. But the Jack Flash haf a pleasant fresh taste while smoked through a pipe. More on the dense side of nugs red hairs with a frosty coating of crystals. Grinds up nicely. The high is very relaxin...â€

â€œThis is a low fear-factor hybrid that knocks off the edges of a straight Jack Herer.  Mellow, and nice for mostly all the time.

Unfortunately the last 1/8 I had went so fast that I could not complete this review in a timely matter but can confirm that Jal has an Earl Greyish flavor profile and is really nice if you are into a fun, buzzzzy high.  

Recommended  - Also checkout Flo.  nsâ€

â€œThis is one of my new favorite strains. Itâ€™s a cross between  Jack Herer, Haze, and Super Skunk.  Sativa with citrus and skunk aroma.  A very uplifting, productive high.  I can smoke it at anytime of the day or night and feel great.  With morning tea and breakfast or late at night when Iâ€™m at home watching a flick.  I highly recommend it.â€

â€œI really enjoy the terpene profile of the strain. It's pretty citrusy and sweet. The high is definitely not necessarily suitable for those easily provoked with anxiety. As in my personal experience, my heart rate increased and felt extremely restless. I would not smoke this before not having something to do! However, if you're going dancing or for a hike, this could be the perfect strain to bring along!â€
â€œFan-friggin-tastic! Excellent hybrid, sativa-dominate. Nice mellow head and body high though still very functional as well. Nice smell, but not too over-powering. Just a great all-around smoke.â€
â€œused in wax form. very smooth. light headed feeling. really relaxing.â€
â€œThis is an odd strain to me I feel very clear headed but also kind of anxious not paranoid but on edgeâ€

â€œWhew, this strain is a mad dog. Really potent and comes on super fast like the description says. The buds look amazing, the smell is wonderful and the high will knock out depression, get you creative and active. Great flower.â€
